description: Erection of a part single part two storey side extension, a single storey rear extension and a front dormer extension; landscaping works to the front and rear garden of the house
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (JCA-0555-001-EP-B+GF Rev. P1, EXISTING LOCATION PLAN, EXISTING BLOCK PLAN, Planning Application July 2019. Received: 29/07/2019. JCA-0555-LOCATION PLAN Rev. P1, JCA-0555-BLOCK PLAN Rev. P1, JCA-0555-001-EP-Site Plan Rev. P1, JCA-0555-002-TREES Rev. P1, JCA-0555-003-EP-B+GF Rev. P1, JCA-0555-004-EP-1F+2F Rev. P1, JCA-0555-005-EP-RF Rev. P1, JCA-0555-005-EE-FRONT Rev. P1, JCA-0555-006-EE-REAR Rev. P1, JCA-0555-007-EE-SIDE Rev. P1, PLANNING July 2019. Received: 01/08/2019. JCA-0555-001-PP-B+GF Rev. P2, JCA-0555-002-PP-1F+2F Rev. P2, JCA-0555-005-EP-RF Rev. P2, JCA-0555-004-PE-FRONT Rev. P2, JCA-0555-006-PE-REAR Rev. P2, JCA-0555-007-PE-SID Rev. P2, JCA-0555-008-PS-AA+BB Rev. P2, Environment Agency Householder and other minor extensions in Flood Zones 2 and 3, ARBORICULTURAL IMPACT ASSESSMENT REPORT JCA/150PKR/AIA/01 1st August 2019. Received: 06/09/2019. JCA-0555-005-PE-FRONT WALL Rev. P3, JCA-0555-005-PP-GARDEN Rev. P3. Received: 22/10/2019) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - The window formed in the flank elevation of the two storey side extension at first floor level shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.

Condition : 5 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the flank walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - A splay of 2.4m x 2.4m shall be provided on each side of the access, the depth measured from the back of the footway and the widths outwards from the edges of the access, and no fence, wall or other obstruction to visibility exceeding 0.6m in height above the surface of the adjoining highway shall be erected within the areas of such splays.

Condition : 7 - The extensions hereby approved shall be used solely as part of the house known as 150 Park Road, Chiswick W4 3HP and shall not be occupied as a separate dwelling nor used for business purposes and the premises shall not be used as a house in multiple occupation, including any use within Class C4 of The Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987 (as amended) or such other legislation as may subsequently supersede it.
